intro: Sertuernera guianensis, commonly known as the Guianese sertuernera, is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly found in the Amazon rainforest. Sertuernera guianensis is often cultivated for its ornamental value in botanical gardens and as a decorative plant in shaded areas.
